item.description:
This restaurant has an excellent reputation for food and service and it affords our members that live east of New Haven an opportunity to join us conveniently. After dinner if you still need more calories there is an Ashley's Ice Cream Shop across the street. Madison is a nice small town for an after dinner stroll on Main Street. Often our meetups seem to focus on the New Haven and west shore area - let's try something new. Here's the link to check it all out:
http://www.allegrecaf...
*****The restaurant requires a firm headcount by May 12th so that is the RSVP deadline. Once you have RSVP'd "yes" we will really be counting on you to show. Thanks. *****
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the restaurant Host or Hostess.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Madison May Meetup Meal ( mmmm )
